data.title: MMTF‑python
data.description: (Macromolecular Transmission Format python) is the macromolecular transmission format (MMTF) binary encoding of biological structures.This title holds the Python API encoding and decoding libraries.The  mmtf-python module is available in BioGrids python 3.6.5.To use this version of python set the environment variable after sourcing /programs/biogrids.shrc:export PYTHON_X=3.6.5    (Linux)export PYTHON_M=3.6.5    (OSX)Alternatively, add this env variable to ~/.sbgrid.confSee https://biogrids.org/wiki/versions  for details.
